sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: cURL 包括 curl, curl-config 和 libcurl 库文件.

sect3.title: curl
sect3.para: curl is a client that can get documents from 或 send documents to any of the following protocols: HTTP, HTTPS (needs ), FTP, GOPHER, DICT, TELNET, LDAP (needs ) 或 FILE.

sect3.title: curl-config
sect3.para: curl-config prints information about the last compile, like 库文件 linked to 和 prefix setting.

sect3.title: curl library
sect3.para: libcurl provides the functionality of curl to other programs.
